eu.kartoffelquadrat.xoxinternals.controller

Interface ActionGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    XoxActionGenerator

    public interface ActionGenerator
    Generic interface for Blackboard-style action generators that provide collections of selectable player options.
    Author:
    Maximilian Schiedermeier

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Action> generateActions(XoxGameReadOnly game, PlayerReadOnly player)
      Generates a map of actions, where each object is indexed by the MD5 hash of its json string representation.

    • Method Detail

      • generateActions

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Action> generateActions(XoxGameReadOnly game,
                                                       PlayerReadOnly player)
                                                throws LogicException
        Generates a map of actions, where each object is indexed by the MD5 hash of its json string representation.
        Parameters:
        game - as the game instance to analyze
        player - as the player for who the action bundle must be created
        Returns:
        a map where every entry key is the MD5 of the JSON string representation for the associated value (action)
        Throws:
        LogicException - in case the provided game type is not supported
